sentences.original_text: The Lord, the Lord God Almighty says
sentences.korean_translation: 주 곧 전능하신 주 하나님이 말씀하시기를

sentences.original_text: All the people will be sad
They will weep and cry loudly
They will tell the farmers to weep with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 농부들에게 함께 울라고 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will tell the singers to sing sad songs for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 노래하는 자들에게 슬픈 노래를 불러주라고 말할 것이다
